contents.text: Welcome to Ouster in San Francisco, your trusted leader in industrial laser hardware.
For hardware troubleshooting and maintenance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot and repair a hardware issue on my industrial laser unit.
I need help diagnosing a hardware failure on my LiDAR unit and arranging repairs or replacement parts.
Troubleshoot intermittent laser diode power fluctuations on my Ouster OS1 LiDAR and get maintenance guidance.
I need help troubleshooting a hardware malfunction on my industrial laser.
Could you help me diagnose and fix a calibration drift on my OS-1 hardware?

contents.text: For firmware updates and software integration, press 2.
One moment please, transferring you to our firmware support team.

navigationGoals: Walk me through installing the latest firmware and integrating it with our system.
I’m looking to update the firmware on my laser sensor so it integrates properly with my autonomous vehicle software.
Schedule a firmware upgrade to v2.4 for my OS1 LiDAR and integrate its point-cloud stream with ROS2.
I want assistance installing the latest firmware and integrating it with my computer.
Could you walk me through updating the sensor firmware and integrating the SDK into my Python project?

contents.text: For sales and general inquiries, press 2.
For new product demos and specifications, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Show me a demo and detailed specifications for your newest laser models.
I’d like a demonstration and detailed specifications of your newest industrial laser sensor for my mapping operations.
Request a live demo of the new OS2-64 LiDAR and detailed specs on its multi-return scanning capability.
I'd like to schedule a demo and get detailed specifications for your newest laser model.
Could you send me detailed specs and arrange a demo for the new 128-channel lidar model?

contents.text: For pricing, quotes, and order status, press 2.
One moment please, transferring you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Provide a quote and status update for my recent equipment order.
I’m requesting a quote for multiple units of your laser hardware and need information on pricing and delivery times.
Obtain a quote for ten OS0-16 LiDAR sensors and check the current lead time and order status.
I'm calling to get a price quote and check the status of my parts order.
Could I get a quote on eight sensors and check the status of my recent order?
